name: GrammarBot
description: The GrammarBot API provides spelling and grammar checking capabilities to your application. Submit text and receive a JSON response with potential errors and suggested corrections.

api_methods.name: check
api_methods.description: GrammarBot will check the 'text' parameter for any spelling and/or grammatical errors, and respond with suggested corrections.

parameters.name: text
parameters.default: Susan go to the store everyday

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Only en-US or en-GB are supported at this time

utterances.utterance: Can you check the grammar in this sentence: 'I has a apple'?
Please find any errors in the text: 'She don't like the movie'.
Check this sentence for mistakes: 'He go to school every day'.

parameters.text: He go to school every day

utterances.utterance: Could you verify the grammar in 'They was playing outside'?
Is there anything wrong with 'We is going to the park'?

parameters.text: We is going to the park

utterances.utterance: Check the grammar for this British English sentence: 'The colour of the car is red'.

parameters.text: The colour of the car is red

utterances.utterance: Can you spot any errors in 'She were happy to see him'?

parameters.text: She were happy to see him

utterances.utterance: Please check this text for grammatical errors: 'The cat sleep on the mat'.

parameters.text: The cat sleep on the mat

utterances.utterance: Could you check the grammar in 'He don't know the answer'?
Is there any mistake in this sentence: 'She do her homework every night'?

parameters.text: She do her homework every night
